description:
Over 10 hours of lessons! This is the comprehensive course you've been looking for that will teach you EVERYTHING about starting and running a podcast.  From equipment, to getting on iTunes, building a website, getting tons of listeners, making money with your shows, communication techniques, podcast marketing, building a community, and more! Browse through the lessons below and you'll see no detail has been missed!

The course creator is successful podcaster Steve Cherubino who from a single podcast in 2008 built a full, booming podcast network in a very short time.  Let him share with you how he did it every step of the way from start to finish.
title: Become A Podcasting Master - The Ultimate Podcast Course
